Welcome to flow’s documentation!

# README #

Flow community is responsible for managing all the services related to flow of the Rakizo platform. Currently, flow community consists of following services:

### Services ###

  • [Flow Service](flow/README.md)

  • [Flow Step Service](flow_step/README.md)

N.B. For the first time after cloning, you need to execute following command to configure git hook configuration, so that it can ensure conventional commits

./git-config.sh
